## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description           | Type     | Default                                  |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------- | -------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| `currency` | `currency` | Currency code         | `string` | `salla.config.get('user.currency_code')` |
| `language` | `language` | Language code         | `string` | `salla.config.get('user.language_code')` |
| `price`    | `price`    | Current product price | `string` | `undefined`                              |
